name: R2_v3_ObservationMethod_for_R5
title: Cross-version VS for R2.v3 Code System ObservationMethod for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-ObservationMethod|2015-07-31 for use in FHIR R5. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R2 to R5.

concept.display: Nucleic acid probe with target amplification
Q-Beta Replicase or probe amplification category method
Acid fast stain, Kinyoun's cold carbolfuchsin
Alcian blue with Periodic acid Schiff stain
Harris regressive hematoxylin and eosin stain
Luxol fast blue with cresyl violet stain
Luxol fast blue with Periodic acid-Schiff stain
Mayers progressive hematoxylin and eosin stain
